overview:
Andrew has an unrivalled mix of operational experience at senior management level. His focus has always been at the intersection of entertainment and technology. From building multi-award winning social platforms and enterprise internet businesses to founding and scaling the New Zealand Beer Festival, an annual sell-out event.

Andrew loves design, whether visual, behavioural or technical. He has always followed a product-led strategy and is great at communicating vision between teams of suits, geeks and creatives. As a customer of Eventfinda, Andrew worked so well with the team that he sold his successful business to join us. His experience gives him a unique set of tools to lead our operational business in the US.

Previous customers and partnerships are a whoâ€™s who of global ad agencies, publishers, media houses, telcos, governments, and enterprise.
